lead_paragraph: Nick Ritchie realizes he is occupying one of the sweetest spots in hockey on a line with Ryan Getzlaf and Corey Perry for the Anaheim Ducks.

headline.print_headline: Ritchie Gets Tiebreaker in Ducks' 4-2 Win Over Vancouver
headline.main: Ritchie Gets Tiebreaker in Ducks' 4-2 Win Over Vancouver
